oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sermon on Busing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Catholic Diocese; busing; religion;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sermon in support of busing as a equal rights issue. The author is not indicated.
